snippet: Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez played a simulated game, but it would have been hard to tell from the obscured view of the troubled star.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez plays a simulated game at team's spring training home; game, closed to public, is watched by reporters from a distance; media is trailing troubled star as baseball prepares to levy punishment for his suspected ties to Biogenesis doping scandal; charts display value matrix, comparison of salary and number of hits, for Rodriguez and 10 highest-paid hitters in MLB.
lead_paragraph: Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez played a simulated game, but it would have been hard to tell from the obscured view of the troubled star.

headline.main: As Suspension Looms, Rodriguez Practices at Padlocked Stadium
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Rehearsal With a Getaway Scene
